SELECT (select dept_name from wkrj_sys_department where dept_id = chengban_dept) as chengban_dept ,count(chengban_dept) as nums
FROM wkrj_reportevent_wf WHERE chengban_dept in (select dept_id from wkrj_sys_department where dept_parent_id = "04")
AND business_type = #{business_type}
AND event_status = "1"
AND qianshou_status = "1"
AND satisfy_status is not null
GROUP BY chengban_dept ORDER BY nums desc
